sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Container, PhotoBox } from './Styles' import { Title } from '../../components/title/styles' import { Button, FormButton } from '../../components/button/styles'; import { Status, StatusContainer } from '../clientBookingInfo/Styles'; const ClientPaymentInfoCont = () => { return ( Payment Status Pending <b>***Please make your deposit. Three days before your Check-In Date to confirm your reservation***</b> Upload Proof of Payment No Image Uploaded or ) } export default ClientPaymentInfoCont
